Posts.Content: I can only answer about the Anesthesia, An hour sounds about right, and yes they will use General Anesthesia. I hope everything is negative but it's a good idea to get it out of there. So don't worry too much.
Posts.Title: Excisional Biopsy Friday ... Questions!

Posts.Content: Don't put the cart before the horse. It could be anything besides IBC. I am sure the doctor will be able to put your mind at ease within minutes of examining you. He will probably send you for a mammogram and ultrasound. It could be anything from a skin inflammation to an allergy to your soap/bra/or insect. Wait and See.
Posts.Title: Terrified IBC - red blotch

Posts.Content: Sounds like you have yourself a hormonal cyst...why not see your doctor for a simple check up, he will probably send you for an ultrasound.
Posts.Title: Painful breasts! Left one worse! Pls help!!

Posts.Content: I had to wait 2 months for mine, only because I'm a very slow healer. Insurance plans can be downright ridiculous, Hopefully your oncologist will get the ball rolling with your insurance.
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy
